official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on composite vials of timolol maleate/pilocarpine hydrochloride solutions and diluent.

summary.text: Amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on composite vials of timol maleatel pilocerpine hydrochloride solutions and diluent.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on composite vials of timolol maleate/pilocarpine hydrochloride solutions and diluent.
